src_original: kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.  kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 617) saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.  kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
tgt_original: 謂緣欲界繫諸行諸行因諸行滅諸行能斷道諸無漏智。

src_original: idam ucyate dharmajñānam.  api khalu dharmajñāne dharmajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ.
tgt_original: 復有緣法智及法智地諸無漏智亦名法智。

src_original: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.  rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.  rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
tgt_original: 謂緣色無色界繫諸行諸行因諸行滅諸行能斷道諸無漏智。

src_original: idam ucyate anvayajñānaṃ.  api khalv anvayajñāne anvayajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
tgt_original: 復有緣類智及類智地諸無漏智亦名類智。 他心智云何？

src_original: paṃcopādānaskaṃdhān anityato duḥkhataḥ śunyato 'nātmataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.  idam ucyate duḥkhajñānaṃ.
tgt_original: 謂於五取蘊思惟非常、苦、空、非我所起無漏智。

src_original: sāsravaṃ hetukaṃ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.  idam ucyate samudayajñānaṃ.  ākārataś cālaṃbanataś ca nirodhamārgajñāne vyavasthāpyete.  tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ.
tgt_original: 謂於有漏因思惟因、集、生、緣所起無漏智。

src_original: nirodhaṃ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ.  praṇītato niḥsaraṇataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
tgt_original: 謂於擇滅思惟滅、靜、妙、離所起無漏智。
